RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: OLTMS_CUST_MASTER_MS.LOCATION = OLTMS_CUST_ADDRESS_MS.LOCATION AND OLTMS_CUST_MASTER_MS.MEDIA = OLTMS_CUST_ADDRESS_MS.MEDIA AND OLTMS_CUST_MASTER_MS.CUSTOMER_NO = OLTMS_CUST_ADDRESS_MS.CUSTOMER_NO AND OLTMS_CUST_MASTER_MS.ENTITY = OLTMS_CUST_ADDRESS_MS.ENTITY AND OLTMS_CUST_MASTER_MS.LATEST_VERSION_NO = OLTMS_CUST_ADDRESS_MS.VERSION_NO

OLTMS_CUST_ADDRESS_MS.LOCATION = OLTMS_MSG_ADDRESS_MS.LOCATION AND OLTMS_CUST_ADDRESS_MS.MEDIA = OLTMS_MSG_ADDRESS_MS.MEDIA AND OLTMS_CUST_ADDRESS_MS.CUSTOMER_NO = OLTMS_MSG_ADDRESS_MS.CUSTOMER_NO AND OLTMS_CUST_ADDRESS_MS.ENTITY = OLTMS_MSG_ADDRESS_MS.ENTITY AND OLTMS_CUST_ADDRESS_MS.VERSION_NO = OLTMS_MSG_ADDRESS_MS.VERSION_NO

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT M.CUSTOMER_NO, M.CUSTOMER_NAME1, M.LANGUAGE, M.NATIONALITY FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER M WHERE ((M.access_group is not null and EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM stvw_user_access b WHERE b.user_id = global.user_id and b.access_group = M.access_group)) or M.access_group is null) AND M.RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND M.AUTH_STAT = 'A' ORDER BY M.CUSTOMER_NO
SELECT MEDIA,DESCRIPTION FROM MSTMS_MEDIA WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND AUTH_STAT='A'

SELECT A.ENTITY, A.ENTITY_NAME, A.ENTITY_TYPE FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_DETAILS A, OLTMS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY B WHERE A.CUSTOMER_NO = ? AND A.CUSTOMER_NO = B.CUSTOMER_NO AND B.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND B.ONCE_AUTH = 'Y' UNION SELECT 'XXX', '', '' FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNTRY_CODE,DESCRIPTION FROM STTMS_COUNTRY WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND AUTH_STAT='A'
SELECT FIELD_NAME, FIELD_DESC FROM OLTMS_STATIC_MAINTENANCE WHERE AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O' ORDER BY FIELD_NAME
SELECT BRANCH_CODE,BRANCH_NAME FROM OLTMS_BRANCH WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND AUTH_STAT='A' UNION SELECT 'ALL','ANY BRANCH' FROM OLTMS_BRANCH

/*MODULE:TYPE */SELECT * FROM (SELECT MODULE, MSG_TYPE FROM OLTMS_MSG_TYPE WHERE MODULE || MSG_TYPE NOT IN (SELECT MODULE || MSG_TYPE FROM OLTMS_MSG_MEDIA WHERE MEDIA = ?) UNION SELECT 'AL', 'ANY MSG TYPE' FROM OLTMS_MSG_TYPE) WHERE 'Y' <> NVL((SELECT 'Y' FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LBTMS_NAMED_AGENT WHERE NAMED_AGENT = ?)),'N')UNION ALL /*NAMED_TYPE */SELECT DISTINCT MODULE, MSG_TYPE FROM OLTMS_MSG_FORMAT WHERE FORMAT IN (SELECT SUBSTR(REC_KEY, 1, INSTR(REC_KEY, '~', 1) - 1) MESSAGE_FORMAT FROM CSTMS_UDF_VALS WHERE FUNCTION_ID = 'OLDADVFM' AND FIELD_NAME = 'NAMEDAGENT' AND FIELD_VAL = ?) AND 'Y' = (SELECT 'Y' FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LBTMS_NAMED_AGENT WHERE NAMED_AGENT = ?))

/*MSG_TYPE : NAMED_MSG_TYPE */ SELECT MSG_TYPE FROM OLTMS_MSG_FORMAT WHERE FORMAT IN (SELECT SUBSTR(REC_KEY, 1, INSTR(REC_KEY, '~', 1) - 1) MESSAGE_FORMAT FROM CSTMS_UDF_VALS WHERE FUNCTION_ID = 'MSDADVFT' AND FIELD_NAME = 'NAMEDAGENT' AND FIELD_VAL = ?) AND 'Y' = (SELECT 'Y' FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LBTMS_NAMED_AGENT WHERE NAMED_AGENT = ?)) UNION ALL /* MSG_TYPE */ SELECT * FROM (SELECT MSG_TYPE FROM OLTMS_MSG_TYPE WHERE MSG_TYPE NOT IN (SELECT MSG_TYPE FROM OLTMS_MSG_MEDIA WHERE MEDIA = ? AND MODULE = ?) AND MODULE = ? UNION SELECT 'ANY MSG TYPE' FROM DUAL WHERE 'Y' <> NVL((SELECT 'Y' FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LBTMS_NAMED_AGENT WHERE NAMED_AGENT = ?)),'N'))

/*FORMAT : NAMED_FORMAT */SELECT SUBSTR(REC_KEY, 1, INSTR(REC_KEY, '~', 1)-1) MESSAGE_FORMAT FROM CSTMS_UDF_VALS WHERE FUNCTION_ID = 'MSDADVFT' AND FIELD_NAME = 'NAMEDAGENT' AND FIELD_VAL = ? AND 'Y' = (SELECT 'Y' FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LBTMS_NAMED_AGENT WHERE NAMED_AGENT = ?)) UNION ALL /*FORMAT */SELECT FORMAT FROM OLTMS_ADV_FORMAT WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND AUTH_STAT='A'

SELECT A.AC_GL_NO FROM OLTBS_ACCOUNT A WHERE A.CUST_NO = ? AND A.AC_GL_REC_STATUS = 'O' AND A.ONCE_AUTH = 'Y' UNION SELECT 'ALL' FROM OLTMS_MSG_ADDRESS_MS C WHERE 0 = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OLTMS_MSG_ADDRESS_MS D WHERE D.CUSTOMER_NO = ? AND D.MEDIA = ? AND D.LOCATION = ? AND D.MSG_TYPE = ? AND D.BRANCH = ? AND D.MODULE = ?) OR (C.CUSTOMER_NO = ? AND C.MEDIA = ? AND C.LOCATION = ? AND C.MSG_TYPE = ? AND C.BRANCH = ? AND C.MODULE = ?)

RAD_SUMMARY.TITLE: LBL_STDCU055_DESC
RAD_SUMMARY.RAD_SUMMARY_WHERECLAUSE: CUSTOMER_NO IN (select a.customer_no from sttm_core_customer a where (a.access_group is not null and exists (select 1 from stvw_user_access b where b.user_id = GLOBAL.user_id and b.access_group = a.access_group)) OR a.access_group is null) AND (SMPKS_MASK_USER.pr_setusrctx(global.user_id,'OLSCUSAD') IN ('N','Y')) AND NVL(IS_FORGOTTEN,'N') = 'N'
RAD_SUMMARY.RAD_MULTIBRN_WHERECLAUSE: CUSTOMER_NO IN (select a.customer_no from sttm_core_customer a where (a.access_group is not null and exists (select 1 from stvw_user_access b where b.user_id = GLOBAL.user_id and b.access_group = a.access_group)) OR a.access_group is null) AND (SMPKS_MASK_USER.pr_setusrctx(global.user_id,'OLSCUSAD') IN ('N','Y')) AND NVL(IS_FORGOTTEN,'N') = 'N'
